item.title: How to download files and directories from github
item.description: Using the github website Probably this is the easiest way to download files from github, by navigating to the file on github and click on the download button. Unfortenitaly, it’s not the fastest, you will have to move the file to the desired destination and doesn’t work for raw files like (txt and .ext). Using wget/curlNow we talk :D, here’s a bash function (add to your alias section) I wrote to automate the download process by using the URL which contains blob keyword.
